  • Method Details

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage (String code)
      Try to resolve the message. Return default message if no message was found.
      Specified by:
      getMessage in interface I18NService
      Parameters:
      code - he code to lookup up, such as 'calculator.noRateSet'. Users of this class are encouraged to base message names on the relevant fully qualified class name, thus avoiding conflict and ensuring maximum clarity.
      Returns:
      the resolved message if the lookup was successful; otherwise the default message passed as a parameter.

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage (String code, Object[] args, Locale locale)
      Try to resolve the message. Treat as an error if the message can't be found.
      Specified by:
      getMessage in interface I18NService
      Parameters:
      code - the code to lookup up, such as 'calculator.noRateSet'
      args - an array of arguments that will be filled in for params within the message (params look like "{0}", "{1,date}", "{2,time}" within a message), or null if none.
      locale - the locale in which to do the lookup
      Returns:
      the resolved message
      Throws:
      org.springframework.context.NoSuchMessageException - if the message wasn't found
